arts.ttl: Roma up against Lecce to make it seven
arts.sum: In their 18 Serie A home matches played against Roma, Lecce has scored 12 goals, failing to score in 10 occasions. Lecce have lost their last four Serie A matches and have not endured a worse streak since a run of six consecutive losses between February and April 2023.
